did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Exposition internationale des arts dećoratifs et industriels modernes postcards, 1925.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Photographic postcards showing buildings, promenades, interiors, sculptures, and other decorative details from the international exposition, including over 30 blue-tinted night shots, some with dramatic views of the Eiffel tower with various lighting configurations.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Photographic postcards showing buildings, promenades, interiors, sculptures, and other decorative details from the international exposition, including over 30 blue-tinted night shots, some with dramatic views of the Eiffel tower with various lighting configurations.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Exposition internationale des arts dećoratifs et industriels modernes. Postcards, #6618. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Collection consists of a single box. Online guide unavailable.
